Data Exploration Tutorial - Video

08 Aug 2017

Here is a nice video from Pycon 2017. It shows a quite lengthy analysis of a dataset mostly with pandas involved. The research question is if black football players are more likely to get a red card then others. The presentation covers everything from

  1. hypothesis building
  2. operationalizing
  3. data cleaning and wrangling
  4. choosing and performing statistic analysis

Fun facts from the presentation: Jupyter Notebooks have something called Cursor Magic. If you press alt + cmd(on mac) you can place multiple instances of the cursor in a cell. This allows for editing multiple lines with similar code.
